revised_title: Osmotic Pressure of Compressible Solutions with Volatile Solvent and Solute
tldr: This article explores the osmotic pressure of compressible solutions where both the solvent and solute are volatile. The author derives an equation that relates the osmotic pressure, vapour pressures, and hydrostatic pressures of the solution and solvent. The findings provide a deeper understanding of the behavior of volatile solutions and their equilibrium properties.
